mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT S_DISTRICT, S_LINE, S_NAME, TRUNC((S_PDUST/150),3)S_PDUST, (S_CO2/1000)S_CO2, TRUNC((S_H2CO/120),3)S_H2CO, TRUNC((S_CO/10),3)S_CO, TRUNC(((S_PDUST/150)+(S_CO2/1000)+(S_H2CO/120)+(S_CO/10)),3)TOTAL FROM SAIRQUALITY ORDER BY TOTAL) WHERE ROWNUM<=5
